testcase.name: Sell subtracts the balance of a user by the price of the product and adds product to the purchased products
Improvement #1 Sell subtracts the balance of a user by the price of the product and adds product to the purchased products
Improved #2 Sell subtracts the balance of a user by the price of the product and adds product to the purchased products
An exception is thrown if user's balance is not enough
Improvement #1 An exception is thrown if user's balance is not enough
An exception is thrown when less than product cost
An exception is thrown when user has no balance
